description: In February 2023, asteroid 2023 CX1 exploded suddenly over France, stunning scientists. Tracked only hours before impact, the tiny rock disintegrated in a powerful airburst, scattering meteorites across Normandy. The rare event provides crucial insights into asteroid behavior and raises new considerations for future planetary defense strategies.
title: Astronomers Reveal Sudden Explosion of Small Asteroid Over France

description: NASA will stream the Sept. 23 launch of IMAP with two rideshare satellites from Kennedy Space Centre. IMAP will study the heliosphere, Carruthers will image Earth’s exosphere, and NOAA’s SWFO-L1 will provide early solar storm warnings. Together, the missions advance space weather science while protecting satellites, communications, and power systems on Earth.
title: IMAP Space Weather Mission to Lift Off Soon, NASA Confirms Broadcast Plans

description: A rare partial solar eclipse will bring a crescent sunrise on Sept. 21–22, coinciding with the equinox. Skywatchers in New Zealand, Antarctica, and the South Pacific will witness up to 86% of the sun obscured at dawn, creating one of the most striking celestial spectacles short of a total eclipse.
title: Rare ‘Crescent Sunrise’ Solar Eclipse to Grace Skies Over Antarctica and New Zealand

description: A new NASA study shows the Sun’s activity has been rising since 2008, reversing decades of decline. The unexpected trend suggests greater risks from solar storms, flares, and plasma ejections. Scientists stress improved forecasting is essential, with upcoming missions like IMAP and SWFO-L1 set to expand space weather monitoring and protection efforts.
title: Sun Shows Signs of Rising Activity Following Decades of Weakening, Study Finds

description: Cellecor Comet CBS-05 Pro, a wireless Bluetooth speaker blending vintage-inspired style with modern minimalism through a fabric finish, has been launched in India. It delivers 80W sound via a single driver and dual tweeters, supports TWS mode, and offers multiple inputs, including Bluetooth 5.3, USB, SD card, 3.5mm AUX, and a 6.35mm microphone. A 4,000mAh battery is claimed to provide up to 10 hours of playback with Type-C fast charging. The speaker is priced at Rs. 5,499 and available via Cellecor stores and authorised retailers.
title: Cellecor Comet CBS-05 Pro Bluetooth Speaker Launched in India: Price, Features

description: Windows users have found a way to enable the Xbox full-screen experience on all Windows-based handhelds ahead of the interface's official release. Users have found that the mode can be enabled with the release preview version of the Windows 25H2 update, available to Windows Insiders. Here's how to enable the Xbox mode.
title: Microsoft's Xbox Full-Screen Experience Leaks on Other Windows Handhelds Ahead of ROG Xbox Ally Debut

description: Samsung has announced festive deals on various devices such as the Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra, Galaxy S24 FE, Galaxy S24, which are scheduled to begin next week. During the sale event, the South Korean smartphone maker will offer discounts on several Galaxy handsets across price segments and series in India. You will be able to save up to Rs. 58,000 on the Galaxy S24 Ultra, which was launched in January 2024 with a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset. On top of this, the company has also revealed the deal prices on several Galaxy A-series, M-series, and F-series smartphones.
title: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra, Galaxy S24 FE, Galaxy A55 5G and More to Go on Sale With Discounts During Festive Season

description: Vivo V60 Lite 4G launch is yet to be confirmed officially by the Chinese smartphone company. But ahead of it, renders and specifications of the upcoming Vivo V-series phone have surfaced online. The Vivo V60 Lite 4G is said to feature a dual rear camera unit featuring a 50-megapixel Sony IMX882 sensor. It could get a Snapdragon 685 chipset and a 6,500mAh battery.
title: Vivo V60 Lite 4G Design, Specifications Leaked; Tipped to Launch With Snapdragon 685 SoC, 6,500mAh Battery

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 will start next week in India. Ahead of it, Samsung, Xiaomi, OnePlus and other prominent brands are selling their popular tablets on Amazon, significantly down from their original price. The iPad Air 3 is confirmed to be priced under Rs. 50,000 soon, though the exact pricing hasn't been disclosed yet. Customers can maximise their savings with a 10 percent instant discount on SBI bank cards and additional cashback benefits through Amazon Pay offerings.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: iPad 11, OnePlus Pad 3, Xiaomi Pad 7, More Listed With Discounts

description: Ahead of Amazon’s Great Indian Festival Sale 2025, starting September 23 (September 22 for Prime members), several brands have unveiled deals on their products. On Thursday, Lumio announced discounts on its Vision smart TVs and Arc projectors. Shoppers can also expect offers across smartphones, laptops, wearables, and appliances, as Flipkart and others host rival sales.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Top Deals on Lumio Vision Smart TVs, Arc Projectors Revealed

description: Coinbase has urged the US Department of Justice to address fragmented state-level crypto regulations, even as the Securities and Exchange Commission reportedly prepares to drop its high-profile lawsuit against the exchange. While federal lawmakers push for stablecoin and market-structure bills, state attorneys general in New York and Oregon continue aggressive legal action, prompting Coinbase to seek federal preemption and clearer SEC rules to avoid overlapping or inconsistent standards.
title: Coinbase Urges US DOJ Action as SEC Mulls Dropping Lawsuit Against Crypto Exchange

description: Nothing Ear 3 was launched in select global markets, featuring a Super Mic in the case that cancels noise up to 95dB and can be activated via the Talk button. The earbuds offer 45dB Real-Time Adaptive ANC, upgraded 12mm drivers, and AI noise cancellation. Connectivity includes Bluetooth 5.4 with LDAC and seamless pairing across Android, iOS, and Windows. Each bud is claimed to offer 10 hours of playback, extending to up to 38 hours with the case.
title: Nothing Ear 3 Launched With Super Mic Feature, Up to 45dB Active Noise Cancellation: Price, Features

description: Nvidia is investing $5 billion in chipmaker Intel to acquire roughly four percent stake in the struggling company. Nvidia's support represents a new opening for Intel after years of turnaround efforts at the famed US manufacturer failed to pay off, and it sent shares soaring 30 percent in premarket action.
title: Nvidia Bets Big on Intel With $5 Billion Stake and Chip Partnership

description: Samsung’s Project Moohan XR headset was earlier rumoured to launch by the end of September. However, a recent report suggests that the South Korean tech giant has postponed the launch of its first XR headset, unveiling the wearable in mid-October, during an online event. On top of this, the company has reportedly also changed the launch date of the Galaxy Z Tri Fold.
title: Samsung Project Moohan XR Headset Launch Reportedly Postponed to October

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 will begin in the end of September. During the sale event, the company will offer various electronics, like phones, smartwatches, true wireless stereo (TWS), refrigerators, washing machines, PCs, laptops, and smart home appliances, at discounted prices. While the sale event is still days away, deals on several iQOO phones have been announced.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Best Deals on iQOO 13, Neo 10R, Z10, and More

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 users in India appear to have started receiving the Android 16-based One UI 8 update in India. Posts on social media platforms suggest that the Galaxy S25 series users are getting the update alongside the September security patch. The update is around 4GB in size. It brings AI-powered features like Call Captions and updates to Now Brief.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Series' Android-16-Based One UI 8 Update Rollout Expands to India

description: Microsoft is inviting select Windows 11 users to join its new Microsoft AI Labs, a platform seemingly aimed at testing experimental AI features in MS Paint. The invites, spotted in non-Copilot+ PCs, appear randomly distributed and do not grant immediate access to tools. While some users reported signup errors, others received confirmation messages promising future features.
title: Windows 11 Users Invited to Test Microsoft’s Experimental AI Features in MS Paint

description: Borderlands 4 players are reporting performance issues with the game on consoles, including the high-end PS5 Pro. Many players have reported frame rates dropping after continuous hours of play. Gearbox CEO Randy Pitchford has said a patch is on the way and suggested players to quit and re-launch the game every few hours of play.
title: Borderlands 4 Players Report Performance Issues on PS5 Pro, Gearbox CEO Confirms Patch

description: BSNL and the Department of Posts have entered into a one-year agreement to provide BSNL SIM cards and mobile recharge facilities through India Post’s vast network of 1.65 lakh post offices. Under this partnership, BSNL will deliver SIM inventory and training, while post offices will manage customer onboarding and secure transactions. Following a successful trial run in Assam, the initiative is now set for a nationwide rollout to enhance telecom connectivity in underserved and remote regions.
title: BSNL Partners India Post to Expand SIM Sales and Mobile Services Across India

description: Xiaomi's upcoming Xiaomi With Diwali sale has announced by the company, with offers on smartphones, tablets, wearables, and other electronics. The company’s Diwali sale begins on September 22, offering buyers products at lower rates than their market prices. Smartphones are available with up to 45 percent discount, while tablet prices will also be reduced by 60 percent. Shoppers can also avail of no-cost EMI offers and zero down payment options during the Xiaomi sale.
title: Xiaomi Announces Festive Offers on Redmi Note 14 Series, Xiaomi Pad 7, QLED TVs and More

description: The Amazon Great Indian Festival 2025 kicks off on September 23, with Prime members in India getting early access a day prior. The sale offers discounts on electronics, including laptops, smartphones, smart TVs, gaming consoles, and more. SBI cardholders can enjoy a 10 percent instant discount, along with EMI, coupons, and exchange offers for extra savings. After highlighting early deals on smartphones, we now bring to you the top offers on premium headsets from brands like Sony, Bose, and Samsung ahead of the sale.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Best Deals on Flagship Headphones From Sony, Samsung, Bose and More

description: Google recently added the ability for users to choose their preferred news source. Now, the company is introducing another feature, which is claimed to make keeping up with news publications and creators easier. The search engine giant, on Tuesday, announced that it is adding the ability to follow different websites, news portals like Gadgets 360, and creators.
title: Google Discover Update Makes It Easier Than Ever to Keep Up With Gadgets 360

description: iOS 26 is currently available for iPhone users, and many users have started reporting problems with the Liquid Glass design. The interface in dark mode is reportedly causing optical illusions and eye strain for users. Some state that the app icons are misaligned in the new UI. Some users are suggesting that reducing Transparency would minimise the effects of the Liquid Glass design.
title: iOS 26 Update With Liquid Glass Design Causes Optical Illusions, Users Claim

description: In July, Gadgets 360 reported that the mass layoffs in the first half of the year were led by global tech giants such as Intel, Microsoft, Meta, and HP. Now, nine months into the year, the job cuts do not appear to be stopping. In the 64 days between now and our previous report, more than 10,000 professionals have received the pink slip again.
title: Layoffs in 2025 (July-Sep): Google, xAI, Fiverr, Salesforce, Oracle and More Fire Over 10K Workers Amid AI Push

description: Apple is targeting a significant increase in its iPhone shipments in 2026, as per a report. The Cupertino-based tech giant expects to produce the highest volume of iPhone units in years, potentially crossing the 240 million units mark. Apple reportedly aims to initially produce the iPhone Fold in Taiwan before assembling it in India, and it could become a contributor in its 2026 shipments forecast.
title: Apple Reportedly Aims for Double-Digit Growth in iPhone Shipments in 2026; iPhone Fold to Be Produced in India

description: Bitcoin held around $117,300 (roughly Rs. 1.03 crore) on Thursday after the US Fed delivered a 25 basis points rate cut, while Ethereum advanced to $4,500 (roughly Rs. 3.9 lakh). Altcoins such as Solana, BNB, and Dogecoin also gained, reflecting cautious optimism. Analysts say capital rotation toward altcoins and fresh liquidity from money markets could fuel momentum. Traders now await Powell’s remarks and upcoming macro data for direction.
title: Crypto Market Rallies After US Fed Rate Cut, Bitcoin Rises to $117,300

description: iQOO 15 could launch soon. Ahead of the formal reveal, a hands-on video showcasing the rear design of the phone has leaked online. Additionally, the iQOO 15 was spotted on the Geekbench benchmarking site with model number V2505A. It could run on the Snapdragon 8 Elite 2 (or Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5) chipset.
title: iQOO 15 Spotted in Leaked Hands-On Video With Colour-Changing Rear Panel; Geekbench Scores Hint at Performance

description: DJI Mini 5 Pro was launched by the Chinese drone maker on Tuesday, according to a press release. The tech firm claims the DJI Mini 5 Pro to be the world’s first mini drone, which weighs about 250g, to feature a 1-inch CMOS camera sensor. It also features nightscape omnidirectional sensing, “true vertical shooting”, and a 225-degree gimbal rotation capability.
title: DJI Mini 5 Pro With a 50-Megapixel 1-Inch CMOS Sensor Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Honor’s upcoming Magic 8 series and Magic V6 foldable could use 200-megapixel camera sensors. As per a tipster, significant camera upgrades are expected on the purported smartphones. One of the handsets in the Magic 8 series is also said to come with a 200-megapixel telephoto lens, in addition to a primary shooter with the same megapixel count.
title: Honor Magic 8 Series, Honor Magic V6 Tipped to Feature 200-Megapixel Camera Sensors

description: Leaked details of the Nothing Ear 3 reveal black and silver versions with a metal-reinforced, transparent case. The earbuds may feature 12mm drivers, up to 45dB ANC, and Hi-Res 24-bit LDAC audio. A 95dB Super Mic is expected to support clear calls and voice commands. The stem displays ‘Ear 3’ in Nothing’s dot-matrix font, with red and white dots marking left and right. Battery life on the earbuds is expected to be 10 hours per charge, extending to 38 hours with the case.
title: Nothing Ear 3 Design Renders, Key Features Leaked Ahead of Launch

description: OpenAI has introduced a new control for GPT-5 Thinking, letting users choose how long ChatGPT spends “thinking” before responding. The toggle offers four modes, Light, Standard, Extended, and Heavy, balancing speed and depth. Initially available only on the web for paid tiers, the feature addresses complaints about slow responses following GPT-5’s rollout.
title: OpenAI Updates ChatGPT With Controls to Adjust GPT-5 Thinking Duration

description: Redmi K90 has been spotted on China’s 3C certification website with the model number 2510DRK44C. The listing suggests that the phone could support 100W fast charging. Moreover, a tipster has revealed that the handset could be powered by the soon-to-launch Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC. It is rumoured to offer a better “audio experience” and new accessories. The lineup is said to include the standard Redmi K90 and Redmi K90 Pro.
title: Redmi K90 Listed on 3C Website With 100W Fast Charging Support; Tipped to Feature Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC

description: Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio's next Yakuza game seems to have leaked. The developer's website reportedly listed Yakuza Kiwami 3 on Wednesday, before the listing was deleted. Yakuza Kiwami 3 will likely be a remake of Yakuza 3 from 2009.
title: Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio's Next Yakuza Game Reportedly Leaks on Its Website Ahead of RGG Summit

description: Garmin launched the Venu 4 and Instinct Crossover AMOLED smartwatches globally. Both models feature always-on AMOLED displays and health tracking, including heart rate variability (HRV) and sleep tracking. The Venu 4 also has a body battery monitoring feature and a dedicated LED flashlight. It also offers skin temperature sensing capabilities.
title: Garmin Venu 4 Smartwatch With LED Flashlight, ECG App Launched Alongside Instinct Crossover AMOLED

description: Meta Connect 2025: Meta showcased its latest tech, focusing on smart glasses and VR updates. Highlights include the Meta Ray-Ban Display with AR screen and Neural Band, Ray-Ban Meta Gen 2 with improved battery, audio, and camera, and Oakley Meta Vanguard for athletes with a rugged design and AI features. VR updates feature Hyperscape for real-world scanning, the Horizon TV hub with streaming and Dolby Atmos, and an upgraded Horizon Engine with enhanced graphics, performance, and AI-assisted world-building.
title: Meta Connect 2025 Highlights: Oakley Meta Vanguard, Ray-Ban Meta Gen 2 Smart Glasses and New AI Features Unveiled

description: Ahead of the Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 which begins September 23, the e-commerce giant has revealed a lucrative offer on the Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra. The handset, launched in 2023, will be available for purchase at an effective sale price of Rs. 71,999. Customers can also take advantage of bank offers, no-cost EMI options, and exchange deals to further lower the sale price of the handset.
title: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra to Be Available at Its Lowest Price During Amazon Sale

description: Ahead of the Great Indian Festival Sale 2025, Amazon has revealed some of the top deals on smartphones that will be live on September 23. One of the most notable offers is on the iPhone 15. The handset is listed for Rs. 59,990, but customers will be able to purchase it for below Rs. 45,000, all of the offers combined.
title: How to Buy the iPhone 15 for Under Rs. 45,000 in This Amazon Great Indian Festival 2025 sale

description: Meta on Wednesday unveiled the Ray-Ban Display smart glasses at its Meta Connect event, succeeding the Ray-Ban Meta Glasses launched in 2023. The new model retains the ultra-wide camera, microphones, and open-ear speakers but adds a heads-up display on the right lens. It also ships with an sEMG wristband, enabling gesture-based controls for users.
title: Meta Ray-Ban Display Smart Glasses Launched With AR Screen and Meta Neural Band

description: At Meta Connect on Thursday, Oakley debuted the Meta Vanguard smart glasses, designed for athletes and outdoor use. Unlike the Ray-Ban Meta series, the Sphaera features a wraparound build and a centrally positioned camera. The launch comes alongside the Ray-Ban Display and third-generation Ray-Ban Meta glasses. Meta had briefly teased the Sphaera in a YouTube video earlier this week.
title: Oakley Meta Vanguard Smart Glasses With a Centrally-Placed Camera Launched, Aimed at Athletes

description: Ray-Ban Meta Gen 2 was unveiled at the Meta Connect 2025 event on Thursday. The successor to the 2023 Ray-Ban Meta comes with significant battery and camera upgrades, as well as a large number of colour and frame choices. The glasses can now capture videos and photos in 3K resolution.
title: Ray-Ban Meta Gen 2 Smart Glasses Launched With 2X Battery Life, 3K Ultra HD Camera
